[[File:Komponist_Paul_Kont.jpg|right|thumb|Paul Kont|200px]]

'''Paul Kont''' ([[19 August|August 19]], [[1920]] - [[26 December|December 26]], [[2000]]), was a prize-winning composer. Along with Leonard Rosenman, he composed the soundtrack for [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film 1978]].
